document_data.mainbody:
Toalars Lane was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Toalars Lane was located in the far northwest section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. It originated on Julthoon Street just west of the intersection with Calamastyr Lane and south of the Field of Triumph. The road branched southwest then turned north to end on Calamastyr Lane facing the Spires of the Morning.
